entry.title: $2576 // OPEN KITCHEN * FREE MONTH RENT * HUGE CLOSETS - FREE LUXURY AMENITIES
entry.content:
ZURIEL HASKINS
Mobile: (917) 543-3226 | Email: zhaskins@areanyc.com

LIVINGSTON STREET (BOERUM HILL)

GROSS MONTHLY RENT: $2,576
NET MONTHLY RENT: $2,392

APARTMENT FEATURES:
  • 1 Month Free Rent (14 Month Lease)
  • Large Living Room
  • Floor To Ceiling Windows
  • Open Kitchen
  • High Ceilings
  • Black Granite Kitchen Countertops
  • 3 Large Closets
  • Stainless Steel Kitchen Appliances
  • Heat, Hot Water & Cooking Gas Included
FREE AMENITIES INCLUDE:
  • 24-hour Doorman
  • Concierge Service
  • Fitness Center
  • Cold Storage Room
  • Rental Storage Cages (monthly fee)
  • Resident's Lounge
  • Outdoor Courtyard
ADDITIONAL LISTINGS:

BOND STREET / (BOERUM HILL)
Apt Number: 405
Size: Studio
Price: $2,466*
Incentive: No Broker Fee + 1 Month Free Rent

Apt Number: PH17
Size: 2-Bedroom / 2-Bathroom
Price: $3,520*
Incentive: No Broker Fee + 1 Month Free Rent

Apt Number: 1534
Size: 2-Bedroom / 2-Bathroom
Price: $4,281*
Incentive: No Broker Fee +2 Months Free Rent

* Net Effective Rent
Where Boerum Hill and Downtown meet, this building offers the best of both worlds featuring modern amenities while contextually woven into the fabric of its surroundings. With an array of restaurants, hi-end retailers, antique shops and transportation all within easy reach.


ZURIEL HASKINS
AREA NEW YORK
LICENSED REAL ESTATE SALESPERSON

Mobile: (917) 543-3226

Email: zhaskins@areanyc.com

I specialize in: EVERYTHING RELATED TO BROOKLYN REAL ESTATE


We at Area New York work hard to find you the perfect property. Whether you are looking for a no fee apartment in Midtown West or a loft in SoHo, we have access to thousands of listings and can help. We have agents who specialize in: Brooklyn (Park Slope, Williamsburg, Bushwick, Fort Greene, Cobble Hill, Brooklyn Heights, Downtown Brooklyn and more!), Queens (Astoria, Long Island City, Rego Park, Forest Hills, Flushing, Ridgewood and more!), Staten Island and The Bronx (Riverdale, Pelham, Marble Hill and more!).. In Manhattan our Agents specialize in Battery Park, the Financial District, Tribeca, SoHo, Nolita, the Lower East Side, the East Village, the West Village, Greenwich Village, Chelsea, Union Square, the Flatiron District, Gramercy Park, Murray Hill, Midtown East, Midtown West, the Upper East Side, the Upper West Side, Harlem, Washington Heights and Inwood. We have agents who specialize in Pet Friendly Buildings, Roommates, International Clients, Penthouses and more! So if you're looking for pet friendly sublet or a large prewar apartment on Park Avenue, contact Area New York today! Thinking about purchasing an apartment or investment property? Area New York can help with that also.
